Live recording of the Rockopera `1000Wishes` by progressive rockband PBII, Hofstad Youth Orchestra and soprano Nathalie Mees as performed on 31st March 2013 in the citytheatre in Rijswijk (NL).
This DVD contains the fullblown performance including the play by actors Frits Lambregts, David van Alten and Pieter van Dijk, the dance performance by DansPlan Segbroek College and the animation videos by Mannes van der Brug and Maartje Mast.
1000Wishes is a compelling story about the boy Eric fighting cancer. Watch him fight the disease together with his friend Sander and his grandfather.
The performance of the play is in Dutch without subtitles. The DVD is available in PAL only.
All net proceeds from this DVD go to the Dutch Children`s Cancer Fund (KiKa). More info on http://www.1000wishes.org
